learning_outcomes: Use common travel verbs (go, stay, visit) in Present Simple
Write a short message about a trip

content.stimulus_en: We arrive ________ London in the morning.

options.text: I stay at a small hotel.

content.stimulus_en: Dear Mom, I ________ London today. It is beautiful! (visitar)

content.prompt_es: You stay at a hotel when you travel.

content.text: We take photos of the city.

content.stimulus_en: John and Mary are on vacation. They stay at a hotel. It is big and nice. They have a room with a view of the sea. Every morning, they eat breakfast in the hotel restaurant. They are happy and enjoy their time.
